metadata.title: CVE-2024-35828 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:libertas: fix some memleaks in lbs_allocate_cmd_buffer() In the forstatement of lbs_allocate_cmd_buffer(), if the allocation ofcmdarray[i].cmdbuf fails, both cmdarray and cmdarray[i].cmdbuf needs to befreed. Otherwise, there will be memleaks in lbs_allocate_cmd_buffer().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
